patterns_discovered: Comprehensive NPS (Net Promoter Score) tracking system
Detailed tracking of user feedback categorization
gotchas_discovered: Multiple unique indexes for performance optimization
Metadata storage as VARCHAR for flexibility
Default configurations with ON CONFLICT handling
recommendations: Add data retention/archiving policy for old NPS responses
Consider adding more granular permissions for user interactions
Implement periodic cleanup of old interaction records
Create application-level validation in addition to DB constraints
